    toc: true

Supplementary Table 10 is the output of the [repeated measures correlation analysis](helper-rmcorr.qmd), filtering self-correlations and any p values > 0.01.

```{r}
library(here)
here::i_am('st10.qmd')

load(here("out/rmcorr_full.Rdata"))
corr <- corr |> dplyr::select(assay_lab1:padj)
```

```{r}
DT::datatable(corr)

writexl::write_xlsx(corr, path = here("out/Supplementary-Table-10.xlsx"))
```
